answer: 解:∵∠1=∠2=∠3=∠4,∴∠GHE=∠GFE,∠HGF=∠HEF,在四边形GHEF中,∠GHE+∠HGF=180°,∠GHE+∠HEF=180°,故可得HG∥EF,GF∥HE,HGFE是平行四边形,∴△AHG≌△CFE,△DGF≌△BEH,△BEH∽△CEF,△DGF∽△CEF,∴\frac{BE}{CE}=\frac{BH}{CF}=\frac{DF}{FC},∴EF∥BD,同理HG∥BD,∴\frac{GF}{AC}=\frac{GD}{AD},\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{AG}{AD},∴\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{AG}{AD}+\frac{GD}{AD}=1,又∵\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{BD}=\frac{GF}{AC}+\frac{HG}{AC},AC=BD,即GF+HG=AC=2,∴四边形EFGH的周长=2(GF+HG)=4．故选:B．
